channel.title: Local News RSS Feed
channel.description: a RSS feed of articles for Local News

item.title: Ohio spent over $11.5 million on legalized weed in less than a week
item.description: Stores sold 1,285 pounds of marijuana flower and more than 173,000 other products, such as vaporizer cartridges and edibles.

item.title: Amish Communities Are Trading The Horse And Buggy For E-Bikes
item.description: Long viewed as tech-averse, the Amish have become enthusiastic users of electric bicycles, so much so that one Ohio community has become a testing ground for new models.

item.title: Signature dessert from each state
item.description: In an era of cupcake wars, crazy creations from cake bosses, and never-ending experimental combinationsthink cronuts, brookies, or PieCakenyou might wonder whether the only desserts that matter these days are ones that go viral on social media. But the idea

item.title: As es como las comunidades Amish estn cambiando caballo y carruajes por bicicletas elctricas
item.description:
Forbes Mxico. As es como las comunidades Amish estn cambiando caballo y carruajes por bicicletas elctricas
Los Amish, considerados durante mucho tiempo reacios a la tecnologa, se han convertido en usuarios entusiastas de las bicicletas elctricas, tant

item.title: Matching sets of dinosaur footprints found on opposite sides of the Atlantic Ocean
item.description: The trackways tell a story of how the movements of massive landmasses created ideal conditions for dinosaurs before supercontinents broke apart into the seven continents we know today.

item.title: Browns, former Ohio State football DT Mike Hall Jr. arrested for domestic dispute
item.description: Mike Hall Jr., a Browns rookie and former Ohio State standout from Streetsboro, was arrested Tuesday for a domestic dispute.

item.title: 2024 college football rankings: RJ Young's ultimate 100 CFB superstars
item.description: Being the top player in college football is one thing. Being the top superstar in the ever-changing landscape of college football takes on a whole new meaning. RJ Young presents his Ultimate 100 CFB Superstars.

item.title: Big Ten football helmet rankings
item.description: The Big Ten has 18 schools heading into the 2024 football season. Little success in the conference since joining and not a ton of reasons to get fired up to go out and buy a Rutgers helmet. Just tough competition in the Big Ten when it comes to football and h

item.title: How every state got its nickname
item.description: The states' nicknames draw on everything from their natural landscapes and popular produce to historical facts and landmarks.
